TopicTitle: Clicking for a Possible Overwrite on the VAB Save Window Doesn't Reset to the Current Workspace if Exiting the Window and Reclicking on the Save Button

Articles.Content:
KSP2 Version: 0.1.2.0.22258
Operating System: Windows 10
CPU+GPU+RAM: i9 9900K+3070ti+32GB
Mods Used: None

Video Evidence:
https://youtu.be/PUD0uDAmfrs (19 Seconds)

How to Replicate:
Using the Campaign Save Folder VABSaveWindowCampaignTest Attached Below:

  1. Go to the VAB
  2. Load ModeratelySizedRocket
  3. Click on the Save Button
  4. Select NotRocketLookingFor
  5. Exit Save Window
  6. Click on Save Button

Note it didn't reset to ModeratelySizedRocket which is the current Workspace loaded.

Campaign Folder:
https://www.dropbox.com/s/n7kx9qln15ftgrv/VABSaveWindowCampaignTest.zip?dl=0

Edited June 1, 2023 by Anth12
